heavyRainWarning: Imvura nyinshi iteganyijwe (>25mm). Rinda imbuto, tegereza gushyiramo ifumbire, kuramo amazi mu mirima.
heavyRainAction1: Pfuka imbuto nto kugira ngo urinde imvura nyinshi
heavyRainAction2: Sukura imiyoboro y'amazi kugira ngo wirinde umwuzure mu mirima
heavyRainAvoid1: Irinde gushyira ifumbire mu gihe cy'imvura nyinshi
droughtWarning: Ubushuhe bukabije buteganyijwe. Koresha neza amazi, shyira umutuburano mu butaka kugira ngo ufate ubuhehere, shire amazi ibyimeza by'ingenzi.
hailWarning: Urubura rushobora kugwa mu gace kanyu. Rinda ibihingwa byorohereye, tegereza gutera imbuto nshya.
highWindWarning: Umuyaga mwinshi uteganyijwe (>30km/h). Emeza ibikoresho, kurinda ibihingwa byorohera umuyaga, tegereza imirimo yo kuvomerera.
frostWarning: Ubushyuhe bwo hasi buteganyijwe nijoro. Pfuka ibihingwa byorohera ibihe, tegereza gutera imbuto nshyashya, vomera ubutaka kugira ngo bwongere ubushobozi bwo gufata ubushyuhe.
floodRiskWarning: Umwuzure ushobora kuba mu duce tuwuteganya. Imura amatungo mu duce tuzamuka, kuraho imiyoboro y'amazi, kuraho umusaruro wese wamaze kweza.
floodRiskAction1: Imura umusaruro wejejwe mu duce tuzamuka
floodRiskAction2: Kuraho umwanda wose mu miyoboro y'amazi
floodRiskAvoid1: Irinde imirima yo hasi mu masaha 48 akurikira
optimalPlantingMessage: Ibihe byiza byo gutera mu masaha 48 akurikira. Ubuhehere bwiza bw'ubutaka n'igipimo cyo ubushyuhe giteganyijwe.
optimalPlantingAction1: Tegura ubutaka bw'imbuto maze utere ibihingwa bishya ubu
harvestingConditionsMessage: Ibihe byiza byo kweza mu minsi 3 ikurikira. Ikirere cyumutse giteganyijwe, byiza cyane mu kweza ibigori n'amafumbire.
seasonStartMessage: Igihembwe cy'ihinga gitangiye. Tegura imirima kandi utegure gutera hakurikijwe ibihe by'ibihingwa.
pestRiskMessage: Ibihe bishyushye n'ubuhehere bwongera ibyonnyi birimo amafundikanya n'uduhunduguru. Kura ibihingwa hafi kandi utegure ingamba zo kubirwanya.
pestRiskAction1: Genzura imirima buri munsi ujyana kuyireba imenyetso y'ibyonyi
pestRiskAction3: Shobora guteganya kurwanya indwara ku bihingwa by'agaciro kanini
diseaseRiskMessage: Ubuhehere n'ubushyuhe butera indwara ya milidiyu ya patata. Kora ingamba zo kwirinda niba uhinze ibirayi.
diseaseRiskAction1: Koresha imiti irinda indwara mbere yuko ziza
diseaseRiskAction2: Emeza ko hagati y'ibihingwa hari umwanya uhagije kugira ngo umwuka ugende neza
diseaseRiskAvoid1: Irinde kuvomera hejuru y'amababi kugira ngo utegere ubwumye bwayo
irrigationMessage: Nta mvura ishimishije iteganyijwe mu minsi 7. Teganya kuvomera ibyimeza by'ingenzi, cyane cyane imboga n'imirima mishya.
irrigationAction2: Vomera mu ma saa ya mugitondo cyangwa nimugoroba kugira ngo wongerere igihombo cy'amazi
plantingRecommendation: Igihe cyiza cyo gutera ibishyimbo n'imboga
pestControlRecommendation: Kora igenzura ry'ibirayi ureba ibimenyetso by'indwara
selectAnAlertMessage: Hitamo imburizi ku rutonde kugira ngo urebe ibisobanuro
noActiveAlertsMessage: Ubu nta mburizi z'ibihe zihari mu gace kanyu
noPastAlertsMessage: Nta mburizi zaheruka zabonetse mu gihe wahisemo
alertNotificationSettingsDesc: Tegura uburyo wakirira imburizi z'ibihe n'iz'ubuhinzi
name: Izina
createNewGroupDesc: Kurema itsinda rishya ry'abahinzi ryo kohereza ubutumwa no gucunga
composeMessageDesc: Kurema ubutumwa bushya bwoherezwa ku bahinzi
messageVariablesInfo: Koresha {{sector}} na {{crop}} nk'ibigize ubutumwa bizasimbuzwa agaciro nyako
title: Umutwe
messagingAnalyticsDesc: Ibipimo by'imikorere y'uburyo bwawe bwo kohereza ubutumwa
changePasswordDesc: Kuvugurura ijambo ry'ibanga rya konti yawe
weeklyReportsDesc: Incamake ya buri cyumweru y'ibikorwa bya sisiteme
messageDeliveryReportsDesc: Raporo ku miterere yo gutanga ubutumwa
userActionsDesc: Ibikorwa byakozwe n'abandi bakoresha ba sisiteme
dataSourcesDesc: Cungira imikoranire n'ahatangwa amakuru y'ibihe n'ubuhinzi
dataMaintenanceDesc: Cungira amakuru ya sisiteme unakoze isuku
twoFactorAuthDesc: Ongeraho urwego rw'umutekano kuri konti yawe
twoFactorExplanation: Rinda konti yawe n'intambwe y'iyemeza yongeweho
apiAccessDesc: Cungira kubona kwa API kugira ngo ihuzwe n'izindi sisiteme
systemDescription: Sisitemu y'Amakuru y'Ibihe ya GanzAfrica itanga iteganyagihe n'impanuro z'ubuhinzi by'ahantu ku bahinzi bo mu Karere ka Musanze, mu Rwanda.
systemPurpose: Intego yacu ni ugufasha abahinzi gufata ibyemezo bishingiye ku iteganyagihe ryizewe, bagabanura igihombo cy'umusaruro kandi bakongerera umusaruro.
faqAnswer1: Amakuru y'ibihe atororanywa hakoreshejwe uruvange rw'amashusho ya satelite, serivise z'ibihe mpuzamahanga, n'ibiro by'ibihe by'aho hantu hirya no hino mu Karere ka Musanze.
faqAnswer2: Iteganyagihe ryacu riba rifite ukuri kwa 85-90% ku biteganywa by'amasaha 24, ukuri kugabanuka ku biteganywa by'igihe kirekire. Dukomeza guteza imbere ingero zacu dushingiye ku bintu nyakuri.
faqQuestion3: Abahinzi bashobora kwiyandikisha bate ku mburizi?
faqAnswer3: Abahinzi bashobora kwiyandikisha binyuze mu mukozi w'ikwirakwiza w'ubuhinzi, batelefonera nomero yacu y'ubufasha, cyangwa basura ibiro bya GanzAfrica mu Karere ka Musanze.
faqAnswer4: Ubu, dushyigikira Icyongereza n'Ikinyarwanda. Imburizi n'ubutumwa byose biboneka mu ndimi zombi.
contactSupportDesc: Bona ubufasha buturutse ku ikipe yacu y'ubufasha
subject: Icyo Byerekeye
describeYourIssue: Sobanura ikibazo cyawe cyangwa ikibazo mu buryo burambuye
morningFarmingRecommendation1: Igihe cyiza cyo gutera imbuto no gutera izimutse
morningFarmingRecommendation2: Kura ibyonnyi igihe ikime kimaze kuma
afternoonFarmingRecommendation1: Irinde kuvomera mu gihe cy'ubushyuhe bwambitse
eveningFarmingRecommendation1: Igihe cyiza cyo kuvomera byoroheje niba bikenewe
eveningFarmingRecommendation2: Shyira ifumbire yo mu mababi niba nta mvura iteganyijwe
forecastDisclaimer: Iteganyagihe ritangwa ku mpamvu zo gutegura kandi rishobora guhinduka. Kora igenzura ry'imiterere mu gace kawe buri gihe.
irrigationRecommended: Kuvomera byagiriwe inama ku bihingwa byose
mulchingSoil: Shyira umutuburano kugira ngo ufate ubuhehere bw'ubutaka
avoidFertilizing: Irinde gushyira ifumbire mu bihingwa uyumunsi
ensureDrainage: Emeza ko amazi ava mu murima neza
seasonAImpact: Igihembwe A gifite imvura ibereye ibigori
seasonBImpact: Igihembwe B kigaragaza imvura irenze isanzwe - byiza ku bishyimbo
seasonCImpact: Igihembwe C kirakamye kuruta isanzwe - kuvomera byagiriwe inama
currentVsHistorical: Umwaka w'Ubu ugereranyije n'Impuzandengo ya Cyera
longTermTrends: Imihango y'ibihe y'igihe kirekire ya Musanze
temperatureTrendAnalysis: Hari umuhango mutoya wo kwiyongera k'ubushyuhe mu karere ka Musanze, aho impuzandengo y'ubushyuhe yiyongera hafi 0.1°C ku mwaka mu myaka itanu ishize.
rainfallTrendAnalysis: Ingano y'imvura ya buri mwaka yiyongereye gato, ariko ifite gutandukana kuruta hagati y'ibihembwe. Igihembwe A cyabaye gihehereye kuruta naho Igihembwe C cyabaye gikakaye kuruta.
positiveEffect1: Igihe kirekire cyo guhinga kubera imihango yo kuba hashyushye
positiveEffect2: Imvura yiyongereye mu Gihembwe A ibereye imikurire y'ibigori
positiveEffect3: Imihango y'imvura irushijeho kuba myiza mu Gihembwe B
challenge1: Ingufu y'ibyonnyi yiyongereye kubera ubushyuhe bwiyongereye
challenge2: Ibiza by'imvura nyinshi byiyongereye bigatera isuri
challenge3: Imiterere ikakaye mu Gihembwe C igira ingaruka ku bihingwa by'umuzungura mugufi
compareSectorsDesc: Gereranya amakuru y'ibihe hagati y'imirenge itandukanye
